subject: HNUR
title: Conversational Hindi-Urdu
info: Conversational Hindi-Urdu is targeted for students with different backgrounds and purposes. This specific course is designed for students who want to acquire only conversational skills without focusing on the Hindi/Urdu script and writing and reading components. English transliteration will be used instead.

subject: HNUR
title: Beginning Hindi-Urdu I
info: Listening, speaking, reading, writing. Development of communicative competence.

subject: HNUR
title: Beginning Hindi-Urdu II
info:
Listening, speaking, reading, writing. Development of communicative competence.

prereq: 1011 or instr consent

subject: HNUR
title: Accelerated Beg Hindi-Urdu
info: This course is designed for students who already have good speaking skills (mainly heritage students) or those who studied Hindi/Urdu in the past and can review basic knowledge of the language at a faster pace than that of regular language classes. Course focuses on all four skills (plus cultural skills) and employs the communicative approach as a main teaching methodology. The Hindi/Urdu script will be introduced right from the beginning. By the end of semester, students will be equipped with linguistic and cultural competencies that will enable them to communicate successfully with people of the target country at a novice-high level, and have a good foundation on which to further build proficiency in the language. Students will learn materials that are normally covered in a full academic year.
